channel.description: Recent content in rhizome on jzhao.xyz

item.title: Rhizome Philosophy
item.description: See the main [[thoughts/Rhizome Proposal|Rhizome Proposal]] Interoperable Data on the web today is mostly treated as second-class to applications.

item.title: Rhizome Research Log
item.description: I think research logs tend to generally focus too much on what one did rather than what one felt.

item.title: Rhizome Specification
item.description: See also: [[thoughts/Rhizome Research Log|Research Log]] … tbd

item.title: Rhizome Proposal
item.description: Companies of the future should derive value from the intelligence they provide on top of existing data rather than have the value be just the data.
